transcript:
man was so surrounded by doctors, princesses, and servants that Pierre could no longer see the reddish-yellow face with its gray mane which, though he saw other faces as well, he had not lost sight of for a single moment during the whole service. He judged by the cautious movements of those who crowded round the invalid chair that they had lifted the dying man and were moving him.
